messages.subject: Fw: Need a favor to help me keep custody of my daughter.
messages.msgSnippet: forwarded with permission (and at request of) the author From: Kari Zimmerman  Hi all.  I have been quiet lately and I apologize for
messages.messageBody:
forwarded with permission (and at request of) the author

From: "Kari Zimmerman" <contry@...>

Hi all. I have been quiet lately and I apologize for that but we have
been going through alot lately. My 8 yr olds father is fighting for
custody due to the fact that I am going to homeschool. I had an idea and
my attorney thought it would be helpful also. Here it is: I was
wondering if those of you that have children between the ages of 6 and 10
would be willing to have them write a short letter telling about their
experience with homeschooling. Things like how the like the one on one
attention, how they like the education, how they feel socially and just
any feelings they would be good to share. I would also then like the
parents of these children to write a short letter giving their input
also. If there are children of other ages that would like to write that
would be great also. I am just wanting to take something to my daughters
dad and possibly to court (if it goes into court I will be sure not show
names of anyone from the letters).
The HSLDA does not help with these kinds of cases so I am kind of out on
my own. I am petrified of the financial impact this may have on my
family but giving up is not an option. My daugter needs and wants to be
homeschooled.
If anyone is interested in doing this please email me privately and I
will give you my address. Thank you in advance ......you guys are always
here when I need you and even if you do not want to do a letter for
me...thank you for just being here :)
Kari~~mommy to Amanda 15, Ashley 7 and Brandon 3.
Wife to Wally.
AIM contry219
ICQ 31745923
Yahoo contry219
